text: Hanki monafinkama mani'nea Ra Anumzamofoma, Jerusalemima mani'naza pristi vahe'mo'zama tevefi kre fanane hu' ofama hunte'zanku'ma hanagetma, ve agaho bulimakaono rama sipisipi afuro, ve anenta sipisipi afura avre nezamitma, witifi, hagegupi, wainigupi, tine masave nazanku'ma hanagetma, kema hanaza avamente maka zupa zamiho.
